mapper.select: select id,xpg,power,currents,voltage,status,create_time,update_time,remark from (select id,xpg,power,currents,voltage,status,create_time,update_time,remark from (select id,xpg,power,currents,voltage,status,create_time,update_time,remark from netty ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{time})as t ORDER BY create_time) as t2 GROUP BY xpg
select id,xpg,power,currents,voltage,status,create_time,update_time,remark from netty where xpg = #{xpg} ORDER BY create_time desc LIMIT 1
